import React from 'react'; const EcommerceStrategy = () => { return (

Ecommerce strategy w/ blogger/celeb adoption

What are the top Dog/Pet Bloggers in the country
we must put together a criteria for who we adopt such as: following/reach, content, consistency, etc.
gifts/monetary compensation
Celeb adoption: paid photoshoots, celeb store visit/shopping comp, weekly magazine opportunities, top monthly magazines.
The above will raise the overall evaluation and sales tremendously.
Need system in place.
Now & Zen PR, Goldfarb PR, New PR agency
Pop Up Shop other even coverage. How are we expanding the content gathered during these events to increase sales/following?
What ideas do we have to do this? Whatâ€™s been done before?

) } export default EcommerceStrategy;
